prompts.label: banner
prompts.text: Wide horizontal scene (16:9 ratio, 1200px wide) featuring a diverse collection of books arranged by reading level, from picture books to adult novels, with reading accessories like bookmarks, reading lights, and cozy blankets scattered throughout. Books are stacked in neat piles and arranged in a flat-lay composition with subtle 3D-style depth. Include floating sparkles and decorative elements around the books. Modern flat illustration with soft 3D-style characters and objects, combined with subtle 2D decorative elements. Use warm, vibrant pastels (teal #00A99D, coral-orange #FF6B35, sunshine yellow #FFD700). Layout must be clean and giftable, using rounded forms, balanced negative space, and minimal visual clutter. The tone should feel cheerful, light, editorial, and creative — never realistic or photorealistic. Use text only in social images.
